directions: Set oven to broil. Lightly coat a large broiler pan with cooking spray. Sprinkle chicken with dried oregano; season with salt and pepper; place chicken in pan. Broil 2 minutes per side. Remove pan from oven; set oven to 450°F. Mix goat cheese and ricotta in a bowl; spread evenly over pizza crust, leaving a 1-inch border. Top with chicken, artichokes, and tomatoes; sprinkle with Parmesan. Bake until Parmesan turns golden, about 8 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh oregano and serve.
ingredients: Olive or vegetable oil cooking spray
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (4 ounces each), thinly sliced
1 cup rinsed and drained canned artichoke hearts, halved
title: Artichoke, Goat Cheese and Chicken Pizza
